fields.description:
Steps to recreate the issue:

1: Create a Mobile App Project for iPhone only.
2: Build the app for iOS device.
3: Install the ipa on iPad device.
4: turn the iPad device to landscape mode.
5: launch the app and you can see inverted image.
fields.summary: iOS: Splash screen comes inverted in iPAD for iPhone only app project
fields.environment: Titanium Mobile SDK, iOS, iPhone, iPad

comments.body:
PR https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/4235

h4.TESTING INSTRUCTION

* Create a sample project (You can use this [project| https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43336767/splashtest.zip] has diff splash screens).
* build the app and bring it up in ipad sim. 
  ti build -p ios -Y ipad
* Make sure initial screen was iphone default/ iphone default@2x (retina sim)
* run the command again and verify the same again.
* Now build the app for device and install it in iPad. 
* Ensure the right splash screen.

Tested with:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201305132058
SDK, build: 3.1.1.v20130514111201
CLI: 3.1.0

Cannot close before TIMOB-13859 is resolved.

Verified iphone splash Appears in iPad sim, iPad non-retina and iPad retina. Appropriate retina and non-retina appears as expected with:
Mac OS 10.8.3
Safari: 6.0.4
Xcode 4.6.2
CLI: 3.1.1-alpha
titanium-code-processor: 1.0.1-alpha
Alloy: 1.1.3-alpha
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201305312408
Titanium SDK version  3.1.1.v20130531143904

iPad 4  6.1.3
iPad mini 6.0
